mapper.select: select ap.activity_plan_id as activityPlanId, ap.name as name, ap.description as description, ap.departure as departure, ap.destination as destination, ap.price as price, ap.price_desc as priceDesc, ap.market_price as marketPrice, ap.take_time as takeTime, ap.traffic as traffic, ap.min_pepole_num as minPepoleNum, ap.max_pepole_num as maxPepoleNum, ap.pre_reg_day as preRegDay, ap.create_time as createTime, ap.sort as sort, ap.image_url as imageURL, ap.topic as topic, ap.exp_inclusive as expInclusive, ap.has_saled as hasSaled, ap.type as type, ap.discount as discount, ap.good_review_per as goodReviewPer, ap.topic_id as topicId, ap.other_attr as otherAttr from mc_activity_plan ap where ap.topic_id = #{0}

select ap.activity_plan_id as activityPlanId, ap.name as name, ap.description as description, ap.departure as departure, ap.destination as destination, ap.price as price, ap.price_desc as priceDesc, ap.market_price as marketPrice, ap.take_time as takeTime, ap.traffic as traffic, ap.min_pepole_num as minPepoleNum, ap.max_pepole_num as maxPepoleNum, ap.pre_reg_day as preRegDay, ap.create_time as createTime, ap.sort as sort, ap.image_url as imageURL, ap.topic as topic, ap.exp_inclusive as expInclusive, ap.has_saled as hasSaled, ap.type as type, ap.discount as discount, ap.good_review_per as goodReviewPer, ap.topic_id as topicId, ap.other_attr as otherAttr from mc_activity_plan ap where EXISTS ( select 1 from mc_activity_tags tg where tg.activity_plan_id = ap.activity_plan_id
and tg.tag_name in
#{tag}
having count(tg.activity_tags_id) - #{tagCount} = 0
)
and ap.type = #{type}
order by ap.sort
desc
asc
order by ap.price
desc
asc
order by ap.has_saled
desc
asc
limit #{from},#{count}
